item.title: Hello World!
item.description: For more than half a decade - since my freshman year at college, I have spent thinking how cool it would be to have a website of my own. At long last, I now have one! The plan is to post something interesting on a regular basis. Now that it’s up, I wish I had done it sooner. We are never happy with ourselves, arenâ€™t we? Making-of It took two weeks to create the design and code the website.
